description: Information about the response that could be relevant for the Beacon client in order to interpret the results.

returnedGranularity.description: Granularity of the Beacon response which may differ from the requested one. For details see the prototype definition.

returnedSchemas.description: The `returnedSchemas` parameter indicates that the request has been interpreted for the indicated entity. This helps to disambiguate between negative responses due to e.g. no hit on a well understood request and failures to interpret or answer the request due to a missing entity.
